word: But we must exercise faith ourselves. We "must believe that he is, and he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him (Hebrews 11:6). . . . Believe, my brother, believe. My soul says, Believe. Take right hold of the promises of God by faith and appropriate them to yourself. . . . In much love to you and yours, Your sister in Christ, Ellen G. White.--Letter 36, Nov. 10, 1875, to a disheartened layman.
